Name: Silla's Group
description:
Silla, pictured above, has been a farmer for more than 20 years, and is now proud to represent her group of eight farmers in Iringa District. She is 42 years old, unmarried and has two children.

Silla likes to think of herself as a very friendly person. She has been working alongside One Acre Fund since 2015 and decided to represent her group because she wanted to help more farmers. She says that being part of the One Acre Fund community has meant that she has been able to save more money. Silla plans to use the profits from this coming season to send her children to school.

In total, Sillaâ€™s Group will receive inputs to cultivate 9 acres of land.
